Stories.Group: Prologue

Stories.Name: Utterance of Marvels: Part I
Stories.QuestDesc: Amidst a ripple of Reverberations, you hear the call... As you unravel your past, a new path unfolds before you, beckoning from the unknown.
Stories.Descrtption: Prologue

Stories.Name: Utterance of Marvels: Part II
Stories.QuestDesc: Amidst a ripple of Reverberations, you hear the call... As you unravel your past, a new path unfolds before you, beckoning from the unknown.
Stories.Descrtption: Prologue

Stories.Group: Chapter I: Jinzhou Rising

Stories.Name: First Resonance
Stories.QuestDesc: As the city lights twinkle, friendly faces beckon you to join them in the bustling border town. Immerse yourself in its prosperous yet tranquil ambiance.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter I Act I

Stories.Name: Echoing Marche
Stories.QuestDesc: As the tides of danger retreat, Jinzhou appears tranquil and vibrant. But beyond its borders lies a fierce and desperate battleground.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter I Act II

Stories.Name: Ominous Star
Stories.QuestDesc: Forbidden memories of the past lay buried in ashes and ruins. The ominous "fractured star" beckons, holding untold secrets within its shadows. Secrets that still burn within a cindered heart.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter I Act III

Stories.Name: Clashing Blades
Stories.QuestDesc: You have discovered the three tokens' purpose and directions, but the answers to their riddles are hidden behind a mysterious entrance, which you found with help from the Sundial's hints.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter I Act IV

Stories.Name: Rewinding Raindrops
Stories.QuestDesc: The previous puzzle's answer has been revealed, but it only leads to another one. With a storm on the horizon, you follow the Magistrate's advice and search for clues about "the Black Shores".
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter I Act V

Stories.Name: Grand Warstorm: Part I
Stories.QuestDesc: As the promised raindrops fall upstream, you embark on a journey north to the battlefield in search of answers.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter I Act VI: Part 1

Stories.Name: Grand Warstorm: Part II
Stories.QuestDesc: As the promised raindrops fall upstream, you embark on a journey north to the battlefield in search of answers.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter I Act VI: Part 2

Stories.Name: Thaw of Eons
Stories.QuestDesc: Quest_125900000_QuestDesc_125_1
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter I: Act VII

Stories.Name: A New Companion
Stories.QuestDesc: After the battle of Norfall Barren, everything came to an end. Your friends are calling you for a meet-up with snacks at Panhua's Restaurant. It seems they like to know more about that "little one" from within your body...
Stories.Descrtption: Interlude

Stories.Name: To the Shore's End
Stories.QuestDesc: The future is still unknown, and the past remains buried beneath the waves. After your journey across Mt. Firmament, all clues now point to a hidden island in the sea—the Black Shores. Yangyang's message hints that in the Port City of Guixu, you might find the Bloom Bearer now stationed in Jinzhou...
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter I: Act VIII

Stories.Group: Event Quest

Stories.Name: When the Night Knocks
Stories.QuestDesc:
A mysterious request, a lost delivery, an opening door...

In a realm where dreams and nightmares intertwine, a massive shadow looms around you. It casts a darkness over reality, opening the doors to dreams across Jinzhou. It asks you, if beauty is fleeting and salvation is futile, why not remain in a dream...
Stories.Descrtption: Interlude

Stories.Name: Cube, Cubic n Cubie
Stories.QuestDesc:
You receive a message from Encore, saying that she has obtained something super amazing and fun, and that she's excited to share it with you. What could it be?
Head to Abbowser Castle and rescue your captured Cube companions. Stop Abbowser's evil plan and make sure the celebration goes off without a hitch!
To keep Abbowser from causing more trouble, you have to keep advancing in the Abbowser Castle.
Stories.Descrtption: Interlude

Stories.Group: Chapter II: All Silent Souls Can Sing

Stories.Name: Through the Sea Thou Break
Stories.QuestDesc: Shorekeeper might have some clues about Abby's weakening frequencies. Return to the Black Shores to find out.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Prologue

Stories.Name: The Sacred Breeze So Often Breathes
Stories.QuestDesc: After a minor twist in the journey, Ragunna, the Land of Echoes, unfolds its grandeur, extending a grand welcome to the traveler from distant shores.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Act I

Stories.Name: Veils Off in Sun or Shadow
Stories.QuestDesc:
To understand Gilberto's part in the Echo incident, you trace his steps to the outskirts of the city. But the deeper you delve, the more elusive the truth becomes...
The schemes of the Fractsidus are starting to unravel. Determined to seek the truth, you set forth to Averardo Vault...
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Act II

Stories.Name: What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing
Stories.QuestDesc:
Following Carlotta's guidance, you arrive at the Pentinent's End and reunite with the Troupe. Here, another buried secret of the Order awaits discovery...
The long-awaited Carnevale is finally set to begin. Together with your friends, you are ready to thwart the Fractsidus' schemes during the celebration...
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Act III

Stories.Name: Old Man and the Whale
Stories.QuestDesc:
Sunshine, beach, ocean… and fish! Rinascita, surrounded entirely by the sea, thrives on its love for fishing. A young man named Ishmael will guide you to the Riccioli Islands, a fishing paradise like no other...
A sailor named Starbuck has fallen into mental turmoil—rumor has it, a fish drove him to this state...
Here, all fish gather—and since whales are also considered "fish", then...
A long-dead captain, a ship that cannot sail. Yet now, that captain has set upon an inevitable course, and the ship must sail once again...
In a storm long ago, a captain and a whale sank beneath the waves together. Now, a similar storm rages, and the whale roams the sea once more…
The sea has calmed, but Captain Ahab and his crew are gone. Ishmael, who first brought you to the Riccioli Islands, seems to be studying the relics left behind by the legendary captain…
Stories.Descrtption: Interlude

Stories.Name: The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier
Stories.QuestDesc: Truths, answers, and choices lie at the heart of the Inverted Tower.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Act IV

Stories.Name: Shadow of Glory
Stories.QuestDesc:
The Maiden left the tower without saying goodbye. Follow her trail to the land of glory.
Seek victory in the city of glory while searching for tales hidden in shadow.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Act V

Stories.Name: Flames of Heart
Stories.QuestDesc: The curtain has fallen on the grand competitions. Don your medal and travel onward to the Vale of Glory, where you shall make a decision that may change how the story goes.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Act VII

Stories.Name: Dreamcatchers in the Secret Gardens
Stories.QuestDesc:
The Dreamer seals her heart and surrenders to a world of dreams beyond mortal sight. In this hidden realm built upon melancholy melodies, she walks a path of fragile hope and delusions without looking back. But the dreams she longs to realize have long been tangled up in shadow and deceit. Beneath the lofty facade of the Orchestrator, who seems to have everything, is but a wretched, pitiful soul, drowning in her own illusions.

In the end, will this dream of blooming and withering be a sweet reverie or a haunting nightmare?
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Act VII

Stories.Name: Rust, Sword and the Sun
Stories.QuestDesc: While waiting for contact from the Ephor's Palace, you and Abby arrive at Solis Tavern, where you run into a blind wandering bard—Nestor. Having learned of the Ephor's invitation to the hunt, Nestor shares with you Augusta's stories before she rose to power.
Stories.Descrtption: Segue

Stories.Name: By Sun's Burning Hand
Stories.QuestDesc: As the High Tide draws near, a lurking calamity stirs, with its gaze fixed upon the borders of Septimont. Ephor Augusta invites you to the Sanguis Plateaus for a fateful hunt, the one that may decide the realm's survival...
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Act VIII

Stories.Name: By Moon's Fated Light
Stories.QuestDesc: With the Sovereign slain, you attend the victory ceremony by invitation of Ceremonial Officer Bruno. The celebration honors the new Hero of Heroes and those who stood by their side amidst the crackling bonfire and joyous cheers of the crowd... Now that the countless petals are to be thrown into the sky to become the rain of glory and triumph, you might finally reunite with the girl you have never forgotten in a way even beyond fate's grasp.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Act IX

Stories.Name: The Bygone Shall Always Return
Stories.QuestDesc: To open the Sentinel's Relic, you head back to Ragunna once more...
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Act X

Stories.Name: Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides
Stories.QuestDesc: With the Dark Tide's threat to Ragunna eliminated, you prepare to set off to Septimont City...
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Act XI

Stories.Name: A Stranger in a Strange Land
Stories.QuestDesc: In this battle that sealed the fate of Rinascita, its people rose in defiance. And among them stood another, a swordsman of Huanglong, guided across the seas by Huanglong Mingting to lend you his strength. He fought as one among the countless souls drawn to this hour, but the story of his own journey, and the shadows of his past, remain known to few…
Stories.Descrtption: Segue

Stories.Name: Stagnant Dawn on Wastelands
Stories.QuestDesc: A pair of constantly shifting spatial coordinates leading to an unknown location has caught your attention. Following the trail, you reach a metropolis... that had been erased long ago.
Stories.Descrtption: Chapter II Act XII

Stories.Name: Flowing Starlight in the Iris
Stories.QuestDesc: After you escaped from Honami City, Chisa, who had pushed herself to the brink of overclocking more than once, received treatment at the Black Shores. You've been apart ever since. Now, it's time to visit her again. For both of you, this will be a new beginning.
Stories.Descrtption: Interlude

Stories.Group: Stay tuned

Stories.Name: Stay tuned
Stories.Descrtption: Stay tuned

Stories.Name: Stay tuned
Stories.Descrtption: Stay tuned

Stories.Name: Stay tuned
Stories.Descrtption: Stay tuned

Stories.Group: Huanglong

Stories.Name: Daybreak at Last
Stories.QuestDesc: After resolving the crisis of TD outbreak, you and Jiyan returned to Jinzhou...
Stories.Descrtption: Jiyan

Stories.Name: Wild Heart's Return
Stories.QuestDesc: In Jinzhou, you meet an unusual... human?
Stories.Descrtption: Lingyang

Stories.Name: Solitary Path
Stories.QuestDesc: A cryptic message reveals the Séance Society's involvement in Jinzhou's disappearances. Is this the key to unlocking the truth?
Stories.Descrtption: Yinlin

Stories.Name: Immortal Blaze
Stories.QuestDesc: You meet an old storyteller when you roam about in Hongzhen. While you listen to the the immortality tales about Mt. Firmament, you notice another interested listener...
Stories.Descrtption: Changli

Stories.Name: True Colors
Stories.QuestDesc:
On the way to the Pioneer Association for new tasks, you received a sudden call from Zhezhi, saying that she was summoned to appear at a dispute hearing...
What is the purpose of this hearing, and what's the story behind it? Caught up in a struggle of consciousness, will this artist being tried find the courage to reconnect with her emotions and talents, and continue to breathe new life into her paintings?
Stories.Descrtption: Zhezhi

Stories.Group: The Black Shores

Stories.Name: Small Wooly, Big Adventures
Stories.QuestDesc:
While in Jinzhou, you run into Encore on vacation. She extends a special invitation to you—
The adventure is about to begin! As Encore's closest friend, will you join the Wooly Warrior on this exciting journey?
Stories.Descrtption: Encore

Stories.Name: Forking Paths Among the Stars
Stories.QuestDesc: The newly planted flowers in the Greenhouse have bloomed. Go take a look.
Stories.Descrtption: Camellya

Stories.Group: Rinascita

Stories.Name: If On a Rainy Night a Family
Stories.QuestDesc: The bitter night lingers for the restless. An invitation from the Montelli family pulls you into its past, where new and old, balance and change collide. In the freest place of Ragunna, the host of the invitation awaits your arrival.
Stories.Descrtption: Carlotta

Stories.Name: Starry is the Night
Stories.QuestDesc: The always calm Roccia reaches out to you with an urgent request. Go to the Strand and check on the banished "pilgrims."
Stories.Descrtption: Roccia

Stories.Name: Sail Day, Captain!
Stories.QuestDesc:
You find yourself caught in a gamble between Brant and the crew, and before you can protest, the title of one-day captain of the Fool's Troupe is thrust upon you.
Are you ready, Captain? Adventure awaits!
Stories.Descrtption: Brant

Stories.Name: A Fleeting Night's Dream
Stories.QuestDesc:
A mysterious letter gently lifts a corner of the veil that shrouds the nights gone by.
A faint whisper from the depths of the abyss waits for your reply.
Stories.Descrtption: Cantarella

Stories.Name: A Blaze in the Dark
Stories.QuestDesc: You witness a crime at the stroke of midnight. To your surprise, a familiar figure appears at the scene...
Stories.Descrtption: Zani

Stories.Group: Prologue: Utterance of Marvels

Stories.Name: Reverberation
Stories.Descrtption: A Blessing To The Vanishing Stars

Stories.Name: The Crownless
Stories.Descrtption: Fatal Encounter With The Sworn Foe

Stories.Name: Roving Journey
Stories.Descrtption: Hello! Our New Friend

Stories.Group: Huanglong - Chapter I: Echoing Marche

Stories.Name: Compelling Might
Stories.Descrtption: Cheers To The Soldiers

Stories.Group: Huanglong - Chapter I: Ominous Star

Stories.Name: Sheep, Sheep
Stories.Descrtption: Self Introduction? Pick Your Favorite One.

Stories.Group: Huanglong - Chapter I: Clashing Blades

Stories.Name: Encounter
Stories.Descrtption: A Secret Between You & Me

Stories.Group: Huanglong - Chapter I: Rewinding Raindrops

Stories.Name: Spring Echo
Stories.Descrtption: Silent & Sincere Is the Language of Plants

Stories.Name: Visitor from the Shores
Stories.Descrtption: Ooh, Here You Are

Stories.Name: Encore
Stories.Descrtption: Cosmos, Cloudy, Encore Tagging Along!

Stories.Group: Huanglong - Chapter I: Grand Warstorm

Stories.Name: Conductor
Stories.Descrtption: Chant The Elegy

Stories.Name: To The Top
Stories.Descrtption: Hurry to the Nest Of Disasters

Stories.Name: The Blade to Destroy
Stories.Descrtption: The Ancient Shadow Sounds Battlecries Upon Jinzhou's Skies

Stories.Name: "Little Thing"
Stories.Descrtption: Stomach Full

Stories.Group: Companion Story: Daybreak at Last

Stories.Name: Daybreak at Last
Stories.Descrtption: Embrace The Past With Steadfast Pace

Stories.Group: Companion Story: Wild Heart's Return

Stories.Name: Wild Heart's Return
Stories.Descrtption: A Clear Chime Cleanses The Evil

Stories.Group: Companion Story: Solitary Path

Stories.Name: Solitary Path
Stories.Descrtption: Curtains Up, Thunder Strikes

Stories.Group: Huanglong - Chapter I: Thaw of Eons

Stories.Name: Spring Thunder
Stories.Descrtption: Spring thunder heralds the world's awakening.

Stories.Name: Meeting the Divine
Stories.Descrtption: What seekest thou before the divine?

Stories.Name: Trail Blazer
Stories.Descrtption: Clear the path and lead the way.

Stories.Group: Companion Story: Immortal Blaze

Stories.Name: Immortal Blaze
Stories.Descrtption: Don't worry... This game is almost over.

Stories.Group: Huanglong - Chapter I: A New Companion

Stories.Name: New Ally
Stories.Descrtption: No need to worry! With me here, everything will go smoothly!

Stories.Group: Companion Story: True Colors

Stories.Name: True Colors
Stories.Descrtption: The essence of art lies in the true colors.

Stories.Group: Black Shores - Chapter I: To the Shore's End

Stories.Name: Towards the Past
Stories.Descrtption: Up is down. The past is the future.

Stories.Name: Observer's Observer
Stories.Descrtption: Her eyes, submerged deep in starlight.

Stories.Name: Stargazer's Dawn
Stories.Descrtption: My observation ends here.

Stories.Name: End of Wandering
Stories.Descrtption: At the end of stars, a world wanders.

Stories.Group: Companion Story: Small Wooly, Big Adventures

Stories.Name: Small Wooly, Big Adventures
Stories.Descrtption: This is a very happy ending.

Stories.Group: Event Quest: When the Night Knocks

Stories.Name: Beast in the Moonlight
Stories.Descrtption: In the chilling moonlight, this gigantic beast sits motionless in the center of the lake. As you meet its fiery eyes, you realize—it's bidding patiently for a chance to drag you into an endless night...

Stories.Group: Companion Story: Forking Paths Among the Stars

Stories.Name: Bloom in the Rain
Stories.Descrtption: Her lost memories pour in, relentless as raindrops splashing into the ground.

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: Through the Sea Thou Break

Stories.Name: An Invitation From a Distant Land
Stories.Descrtption: The Montelli family holds in high regard each of its many friendships.

Stories.Name: Through Dark Clouds and Unpredictable Reefs
Stories.Descrtption: Perfet to an opening of an adventure story, is it not?

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: Veils Off in Sun or Shadow

Stories.Name: The Last Lullaby of the Night
Stories.Descrtption: Listen to your hearts and let the song guide your path.

Stories.Name: The Fading White Needs No Mourn
Stories.Descrtption: The family's protection extends to all who stand by us.

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing

Stories.Name: As Though an Reflection in the Wise Eye
Stories.Descrtption: Don't worry, she has a gentle touch. The "fireworks" won't hurt you.

Stories.Name: Fly, Fly to the High Heavens
Stories.Descrtption: We are born free, and our souls will soar even in death.

Stories.Name: Tacit Steps
Stories.Descrtption: A performance doesn't have many dos and don'ts, just relax and express yourselves freely on stage!

Stories.Name: The Idiomatic Song Welcomes Its Return
Stories.Descrtption: Accompanied by a grand performance and its roaring crowd, the troupe arrives as promised.

Stories.Name: The Night Shines Ever Bright
Stories.Descrtption: The stage is set, and the curtain rises. Actors, the moment to dazzle has arrived.

Stories.Name: Crimson Invitation
Stories.Descrtption: "Now, I shall reveal the truth behind that idyllic ending..."

Stories.Name: A Silent Choir Presented In the Name of a Play
Stories.Descrtption: You should take center stage for the final bow.

Stories.Group: Companion Story: If On a Rainy Night a Family

Stories.Name: From the Glittering Depths
Stories.Descrtption: The gun was always there. You earned the right to use it the moment you chose to act on your own accord.

Stories.Name: No Sleep in the Bitter Night
Stories.Descrtption: "Then let's fall together... You and I."

Stories.Group: Companion Story: Starry is the Night

Stories.Name: Starry is the Night
Stories.Descrtption: Starlight splashes across the entire troupe, illuminating the corners of her eyes.

Stories.Group: Companion Story "Sail Day, Captain!"

Stories.Name: Midnight Improv
Stories.Descrtption: "With any luck, it'll be a catchy one for my next performance on stage."

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier

Stories.Name: Light and Wind
Stories.Descrtption: Take my power, my blessings, my past. Seek out a future... Where I am your blade. We'll find it together.

Stories.Name: The Ending She Desired
Stories.Descrtption: "Well done." Her final words were not laced with the bitterness of a defeat, but with a deep, comforting gratitude.

Stories.Name: Slaying the Evil
Stories.Descrtption: Light. Come hither… Make way for your destroyer.

Stories.Name: Fulfilled Expectation
Stories.Descrtption: Arbiter. One question remains... Did I fulfill the charge set upon me?

Stories.Group: Companion Story: A Fleeting Night's Dream

Stories.Name: A Fleeting Night's Dream
Stories.Descrtption: It feels like nothing happened, as though everything was just a fleeting night's dream. But you know it was real, for Cantarella stands right beside you.

Stories.Group: Event Quest "Cube, Cubic n Cubie"

Stories.Name: A Moment to Remember
Stories.Descrtption: Your life stretches ahead, shaped by moments you'll never forget.

Stories.Group: Event Quest "Your Summer Will Never Wither"

Stories.Name: When Music First Sounded
Stories.Descrtption: A girl surrounded by birds, her world filled with poetry and song.

Stories.Name: Your Summer Will Never Wither
Stories.Descrtption: Though we have never met, your poetry and music bridge time and bind us together.

Stories.Group: Companion Story "A Blaze in the Dark"

Stories.Name: As Dawn Breaks
Stories.Descrtption: The darkest hour fades and hope quietly takes root in her heart.

Stories.Name: The Final Debt
Stories.Descrtption: A story born from violence often ends in violence.

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: Shadow of Glory

Stories.Name: A Wolfy Greeting
Stories.Descrtption: The lone wolf locks eyes with you. In her gaze, you see excitement, respect... and a reflection of yourelf staring back.

Stories.Name: Together
Stories.Descrtption: Though she remains out of reach, she stands at your side in battle.

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: Flames of Heart

Stories.Name: The Last Arena
Stories.Descrtption: Only those who press on without faltering shall claim the final victory.

Stories.Name: Reunion
Stories.Descrtption: At the end of this story awaits a warm embrace.

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: Dreamcatchers in the Secret Gardens

Stories.Name: In the Enemy's Lead
Stories.Descrtption: She became your sight, and you her blade

Stories.Name: An Unexpected Soulmate
Stories.Descrtption: An unexpected blossom grows, from a withering bud inadvertently saved by the rain.

Stories.Name: The Dark Days Are Over
Stories.Descrtption: He had never felt his soul this light and complete.

Stories.Name: Sinking in a dream
Stories.Descrtption: True or false, real or fake, an unspeakable tragedy that sleeps eternally at the bottom of the sea.

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: Rust, Sword and the Sun

Stories.Name: The Path to Coronation
Stories.Descrtption: Bear witness, for the sun and the moon will witness this extraordinary power, and witness the epic of her sacrifice for Septimont.

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: By Sun's Burning Hand

Stories.Name: Hunt Begins
Stories.Descrtption: Call forth the fire in your heart, warriors. Ride the wind with fearless gryphons across the cliffs, towards the grounds reddened by blood.

Stories.Name: As Foretold
Stories.Descrtption: She was no child of prophecy, no heir to glory, no ruler by right. Yet in the sun's moment of weakness, she brought her blade to fate's throat.

Stories.Name: Sun and Moon
Stories.Descrtption: In the light of sun and moon, all that is shrouded in darkness shall be exposed.

Stories.Name: Follow the Light
Stories.Descrtption: "People follow the sun, for it never fails to light their way."

Stories.Name: The Heroes
Stories.Descrtption: Join me in battle, heroes of Septimont! The eternal sun will sing of our triumph!

Stories.Name: Where Sun Burns Brightest
Stories.Descrtption: Glory to you and me, to every unyielding soul on this land.

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: By Moon's Fated Light

Stories.Name: Pale Silver Solitude
Stories.Descrtption: "A death that shouldn't have happened, traded for an unforetold victory. A fair deal."

Stories.Name: Genius Is a Curse
Stories.Descrtption: That is a future glimpsed a thousand times, one which is absolutely correct, yet completely meaningless.

Stories.Name: Singular Answer
Stories.Descrtption: The moon will fall no more, for she knows every arrow she lets loose will find its mark.

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: The Bygone Shall Always Return

Stories.Name: Glory of Humanity
Stories.Descrtption: At fate's end, there was no divine intervention to save him, for from the moment those gears began turning, he was no longer a man of himself. Yet he still chose to defend his final glory.

Stories.Name: Hunting the Light
Stories.Descrtption: She walks the path of salvation. She commits the sin of killing.

Stories.Name: Epicenter of Turmoil
Stories.Descrtption: Sealed memories unfold amidst chaos.

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides

Stories.Name: Doomsday Revelation
Stories.Descrtption: "When the black lamb parts the curtain, the heavens fall silent for about two quarters. I hear the horn of doom sound, and the gates of Paradise swing open..."

Stories.Name: Should Darkness Lie Ahead
Stories.Descrtption: Then this body shall burn to illuminate the darkness.

Stories.Name: Pull the Trigger
Stories.Descrtption: The spirits shall ferry the one across.

Stories.Name: A Dawn Without Divinity
Stories.Descrtption: The sun still rises.

Stories.Name: Origin of Islands
Stories.Descrtption:
They betowed hope upon humanity, guiding them toward a path of freedom.
It was born from the longing for unity, bringing terror to every free soul.

Stories.Name: Start of Eternal Hunt
Stories.Descrtption: "Hunt with me, or die with me... Your choice."

Stories.Group: Rinascita Chapter II: A Stranger in a Strange Land

Stories.Name: Moment of Reflection
Stories.Descrtption: History grants no second chances.

Stories.Group: Chronorift Metropolis Chapter II: Stagnant Dawn on Wastelands

Stories.Name: Crimson Rainfall
Stories.Descrtption: In the rain-drenched night, only she sees the trembling crimson string.

Stories.Name: "Monster" in the Train
Stories.Descrtption: The girl's inner world: her past, her hometown.

Stories.Name: Your Way Back
Stories.Descrtption: Past the horizon line, thousands of lights will illuminate your way.

Stories.Group: Chronorift Metropolis Chapter II: Flowing Starlight in the Iris

Stories.Name: Opening Party and Wishes
Stories.Descrtption: "…I wish for the moments spent with friends to last forever."

Stories.Name: Flow of Frequencies
Stories.Descrtption: Together, you gaze at the crossroads that lead to the future.

Stories.Name: Stay tuned
Stories.Descrtption: Stay tuned

Stories.Descrtption: Stay tuned

Stories.Group: Side Quests

Stories.Name: When Moonlight Shines in the Forest
Stories.Descrtption: Following the events of the Dim Forest, Qiaomu and Hoohoo decided to stay around the Violet Banyan. They seem particularly interested in the moons of the Violet Banyan.

Stories.Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Cat's Language
Stories.Descrtption: A strange researcher is trying to talk to cats through a special function of her Terminal...

Stories.Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Rabbit's Language
Stories.Descrtption: You meet Xuanyin again. This time, she is spying on a Green Rabbit...

Stories.Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Dog's Language
Stories.Descrtption: You meet Xuanyin again, who is having fun with some puppies...

Stories.Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Fish's Language
Stories.Descrtption: You meet Xuanyin again. This time, she is spying on the Tetra...

Stories.Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Frog's Language
Stories.Descrtption: You meet Xuanyin again, while the sounds of frog surround you...

Stories.Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Lizard's Language
Stories.Descrtption: You meet Xuanyin again, who was buried in thoughts...

Stories.Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Bird's Language
Stories.Descrtption: You meet Xuanyin again. This time, she is trying to talk to a Gray Crested Gull...

Stories.Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Bird's Language - Sequel
Stories.Descrtption: You meet Xuanyin again. This time, she is observing the doves on the rooftop...

Stories.Name: Journal of Jinzhou: Vo.1
Stories.Descrtption: You see two engaging in a heated discussion on the journal. Go and check what has happened.

Stories.Name: Journal of Jinzhou: Vol.2
Stories.Descrtption: The upcoming issue of the journal is in progress. Go and check out the featured content.

Stories.Name: Under the Moonlit Banyan
Stories.Descrtption: You learned from Lingyang about the story of a Jingle Beast. It is said that they once lived in the vicinity of the Violet Banyan in Dim Forest. Why not go and take a look?

Stories.Name: Restart the radar
Stories.Descrtption: The Jinzhou military wants to restart the radar at Desorock Highland, but the engineer in charge has yet to show up...

Stories.Name: Photos of Jinzhou
Stories.Descrtption: You find a crowd in a peculiar corner of Jinzhou. Why not go and check it out?

Stories.Name: Wait for Godo
Stories.Descrtption: Take Midnight Rangers Godo's place on guard duty

Stories.Name: The Past is the Future: Introduction
Stories.Descrtption: The girl behind the theater seems to have trouble looking for the gift her sister left her. Go and learn about the situation.

Stories.Name: The Past is the Future: Continued
Stories.Descrtption: Shixia invited you to join her in climbing the West Hill. Reach the hilltop before dawn.

Stories.Name: Silver-haired Echo Trainer - I
Stories.Descrtption: Why does Grandpa Jingzhu insist on capturing Echoes? Go meet up with Chixia and help Grandpa Jingzhu together.

Stories.Name: The Fabled Magnetic Cube Mechanics - I
Stories.Descrtption: The nagging engineer Mizhi always mentions hearing a mysterious sound calling him...

Stories.Name: Tacet Discord Hunter
Stories.Descrtption: Find the Resonator who once proclaimed to be "Tacet Discord Hunter" to obtain the precious TD Material.

Stories.Name: Silver-haired Echo Trainer - II
Stories.Descrtption: Grandpa Jingzhu has come up with a new method to train Echoes. Go and ask him about the details.

Stories.Name: The Fabled Magnetic Cube Mechanics - II
Stories.Descrtption: Mizhi has gone missing, and someone has tampered with the Mechanics. Qingshu, Mizhi's senior, is very worried.

Stories.Name: The Fabled Magnetic Cube Mechanics - III
Stories.Descrtption: Mizhi has come to his senses. What exactly did he encounter in the abandoned mine, and did he manage to find the ultimate Mechanics he had been pursuing?

Stories.Name: Misfortune on a Workday
Stories.Descrtption: Constant cries for help persist from the Exiles camp. Defeat the Exiles and rescue the caller from the camp.

Stories.Name: Lost Ranger
Stories.Descrtption: Mrs. Jué is worried about Guhong, who regularly visits the elderly but hasn't shown up for a few days. Help her find him.

Stories.Name: De-Hoochief
Stories.Descrtption: You encountered an anxious researcher, who requests your help to fight off the Hoochiefs.

Stories.Name: A Quest of Wits - I
Stories.Descrtption: You meet a strange dual in the Dim Forest. They seem to have peculiar questions for you. Answer their questions correctly, and you might receive some rewards.

Stories.Name: A Quest of Wits - II
Stories.Descrtption: You meet a strange dual in the Dim Forest. They seem to have peculiar questions for you. Answer their questions correctly, and you might receive some rewards.

Stories.Name: A Quest of Wits - III
Stories.Descrtption: You meet a strange dual in the Dim Forest. They seem to have peculiar questions for you. Answer their questions correctly, and you might receive some rewards.

Stories.Name: Camp Raid
Stories.Descrtption: Outrider Cunren is recruiting new members for a plan to raid the observation camp at the mountaintop in the Gorges of Spirits. However, it seems that the Outriders were only assigned a reconnaissance mission. Why is Cunren acting on his own?

Stories.Name: Silver-haired Echo Trainer - III
Stories.Descrtption: Grandpa Jingzhu finally reveals the ultimate secret to training Echoes...! Will he finally get what he wants this time?

Stories.Name: Investigate the Theft of Camp Supplies
Stories.Descrtption: Find out the whereabouts of the camp supplies

Stories.Name: The Past is the Future: Epilogue
Stories.Descrtption: Head to the back of theater and accept the gift Shixia has prepared for you.

Stories.Name: The Eternal Concert
Stories.Descrtption: Rumors of sounds of a piano echoing in the rain seems to have attracted many curious visitors. Go investigate around the abandoned theater and find out the truth about this strange phenomenon.

Stories.Name: Save the World? Save the Cat!
Stories.Descrtption: The cat of the restaurant owner Xiaoju has not returned. Please help find the naughty cat and bring it back to its owner.

Stories.Name: Messenger
Stories.Descrtption: Patroller Chuyi in the Dim Forest would like your help delivering a letter.

Stories.Name: Shooting Party
Stories.Descrtption: You've received an invitation to a peculiar shooting party, seemingly related to the damaged robot in Settle Range. Go check it out.

Stories.Name: Secret Investigation
Stories.Descrtption: The Patrollers near the Fireflies Sea seems to be in trouble. Learn about the situation before things get serious.

Stories.Name: No Response Tonight
Stories.Descrtption: You've picked up a recording. The wind is howling in your ears, carrying the whispers. Perhaps, the robot nearby holds the key to unravel the continuation of the story.

Stories.Name: A True Arena Champion
Stories.Descrtption: You encountered an Exile attacked by Tacet Discords. After witnessing your capabilities, he seeks for you aid.

Stories.Name: A Free Meal?
Stories.Descrtption: Defeat Tacet Discords for rewards? Talk about a real free meal! Join Patroller Minghu, apply and secure your spot!

Stories.Name: Time to Study
Stories.Descrtption: Jiu is supposed to be at the academy, but he appears troubled by something. Check out what happened to him.

Stories.Name: Danger! Explosive!
Stories.Descrtption: On the hillside, Exile Yongli is surrounded by Explosive Charges. You detonated all of the charges out of impulse. Go listen to what he has to say.

Stories.Name: Repair the Lighthouse at the Wuming Bay
Stories.Descrtption: The lighthouse at the Wuming Bay has lost power. Try to restore its power!

Stories.Name: Repair the lighthouse in Desorock Highland
Stories.Descrtption: Tacet Discords threaten the engineer on her way to the lighthouse. Provide her with escort.

Stories.Name: Lost History
Stories.Descrtption: Locate five lighthouses in Huanglong, collect information, and help the historian to uncover the truth

Stories.Name: Hero of the Leap
Stories.Descrtption: Owing to Dashbon's great efforts, you learned of the legends of the Hero of the Leap. Follow his guidance and conquer the Overdash challenge and claim the title of Overdash Master!

Stories.Name: Specialty Drinks
Stories.Descrtption: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...

Stories.Name: Sea of Flowers in the Valley
Stories.Descrtption: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...

Stories.Name: Golden Insect
Stories.Descrtption: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...

Stories.Name: Crownless?
Stories.Descrtption: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project The Second Coming of Solaris...

Stories.Name: Unforgettable Dishes
Stories.Descrtption: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...

Stories.Name: Mithril
Stories.Descrtption: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...

Stories.Name: Burning Jade
Stories.Descrtption: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...

Stories.Name: A Taste of Everything
Stories.Descrtption: Though the promise of sharing a meal has yet to be fulfilled, now could be an opportune moment to catch up with her. If you have no other pressing matters, why not arrange a meeting in Jinzhou?

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Port City of Guixu
Stories.Descrtption: The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these torn pages. Go and deliver them to him.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Norfall Barrens
Stories.Descrtption: The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these Data Chips. Go and deliver them to him.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Gorges of Spirits
Stories.Descrtption: The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these torn pages. Go and deliver them to him.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Central Plains
Stories.Descrtption: The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these torn pages. Go and deliver them to him.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Whining Aix's Mire
Stories.Descrtption: The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these Data Chips. Go and deliver them to him.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Desorock Highland
Stories.Descrtption: The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these Data Chips. Go and deliver them to him.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Tiger's Maw
Stories.Descrtption: The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these Data Chips. Go and deliver them to him.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Dim Forest
Stories.Descrtption: The Storyteller of Jinzhou Theater is collecting these Data Chips. Go and deliver them to him.

Stories.Name: Moon Shall Be My Guest
Stories.Descrtption: You meet Xiangli Yao again under the Wishing Tree. Yet, this time you share a walk not for others' wishes but for the moon's glory and the bustling lives of people.

Stories.Name: Chasing the Moon's Glory
Stories.Descrtption: Not far away from Yumyum Haven, you meet Zhezhi, who is troubled by a lack of inspiration for her paintings. Ask her about it.

Stories.Name: Dance Dance Chelonian!
Stories.Descrtption: On an island in a lake around Hongzhen, a Hoartoise seems to have a conflict with other Tacet Discords... Do Tacet Discords lock horns?

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign II
Stories.Descrtption: You have a new "Lollo Fixit" order. Please fulfill it in time.

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign III
Stories.Descrtption: You have a new "Lollo Grocery Shopping" order. Please fulfill it in time.

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign IV
Stories.Descrtption: Maji looks strange today. Ask him what happened.

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign V
Stories.Descrtption: You have a new "Lollo Petter" order. Please fulfill it in time.

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign VI
Stories.Descrtption: You have a new "Lollo Eater" order. Please fulfill it in time.

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign Finale
Stories.Descrtption: You have a new "Lollo Take-in" order. Please fulfill it in time.

Stories.Name: Professional Inheritance
Stories.Descrtption:
Uncle Dong has found a treasure left by an ancient person. This could prove to be a must-see of his stall, "Thus Says the Moon".

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Stories.Name: Cause to Fight for
Stories.Descrtption:
Jiyan sends a message from his post far on the frontline, which seems to concern something important...

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Stories.Name: Lores Beyond the Ranges
Stories.Descrtption: Two mysterious events happened in Hongzhen. Xinyi presumes there are ulterior motives behind them...

Stories.Name: The Supreme Gunslinger!
Stories.Descrtption:
A challenge called "Moon Shooter" is known at the Moonlit Fair. Interesting challenges like this are meant for Chixia... and you!

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Stories.Name: Encore's Steaming Adventure!
Stories.Descrtption:
Xisha asks you to make him the legendary fireworks. Seems like an easy job... maybe?

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Stories.Name: Puzzle of Puzzles
Stories.Descrtption:
The Pioneer Association is offering generous prizes for "Hsin's Fortuity", among them is the surprise jackpot, and Changli manages to draw it. To make things more dramatic, the prize is a treasure map about a Court of Savantae legacy...

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Stories.Name: Riddle and Reunion
Stories.Descrtption:
Riddle Twiddle is offering a limited special prize! Join Yangyang and try to win it!

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Stories.Name: Kaleidoscope of Hongzhen
Stories.Descrtption: Xunjing, an editor for "Wutherium Geographic", is seeking a photographer. According to him, this is related to an existential crisis in his career...

Stories.Name: Spring Adventures
Stories.Descrtption: Bing'ge has been scorched for his work recently. He needs someone who can help.

Stories.Name: Operation: Lunar Duo
Stories.Descrtption:
Enforce justice and cleanse the crimes lurking in the shadow before the Moon-Chasing Festival is around, now!

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Stories.Name: Wish You Were Here
Stories.Descrtption:
Dianxiao is finally opening her Fan Drawing Stall. Go visit it.

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Stories.Name: Blessed Be the Moon
Stories.Descrtption:
As the preparation for the Moonlit Fair is nearly complete, the whole venue exudes a vibe of joy. At this point, Jinhsi, the much anticipated Magistrate of Jinzhou shows up...

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Stories.Name: The Last Knight
Stories.Descrtption:
In Egla Town, you hear legends of the "Night Reveries" and a "Mad Knight." You decide to investigate these stories.

<color=highlight>Hidden rewards can be found in this area.</color>

Stories.Name: Cerulean Echoes Adrift in the Winds: Part I
Stories.Descrtption: Rescue the trapped Aetherfin with KU-Key

Stories.Name: Boundary of Deduction
Stories.Descrtption: At the entrance to a sealed room on the lower level, a malfunctioning robot keeps repeating fragmented instructions. Communicate with it to uncover the hidden story concealed within this room.

Stories.Name: Quest of Faith
Stories.Descrtption: Ruins litter Penitent's End where the shadows of knights wander among the crumbling walls. A faint voice floats through the sea mist, guiding your way. "Seeker, follow in the footsteps of the knights from long ago. Uncover the long-buried truth." Hidden rewards can be found in this area.

Stories.Name: Cerulean Echoes Adrift in the Winds: Part II
Stories.Descrtption: Head to the lower level and rescue the trapped Aetherfin with KU-Key

Stories.Name: Trials of Old
Stories.Descrtption:
A secret letter finds its way to your hands.
It tells of a mysterious trial at Porto-Veno Castle, one with unmistakable links to the Fisalia family...

<color=highlight>Hidden rewards can be found in this area.</color>

Stories.Name: Skyward Voyage
Stories.Descrtption: An old captain named Davide is preparing for the last voyage of his life. But this time, his sights are set on something above the seas...

Stories.Name: The Hidden Treasure of the Black Shores
Stories.Descrtption: After following the clues, you discover the room said to conceal hidden treasures. Yet, it appears to be just an ordinary room…

Stories.Name: Yhoran's Tactical Trial
Stories.Descrtption:
Yhoran, a member of the Black Shores Emergency Response Team, is currently testing new strategies against Tacet Discords. Defeat the targets and meet the special challenge goals to earn extra rewards prepared by Yhoran.
"When you're prepared, the Reaper will not come."

Stories.Name: Chasing the Moon, Here and Now
Stories.Descrtption: The Moonlit Fair has started as expected. Please maintain its popularity.

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation V
Stories.Descrtption: The Day 5 Campaign content has been updated, but a courier has encountered difficulties and is calling for help…

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation II
Stories.Descrtption: The Day 2 Campaign content has been updated to include new maintenance and navigation features. Test out the new functions and see how they enhance your experience!

Stories.Name: Data Overdash
Stories.Descrtption: The Black Shores' researcher is waiting for you to test out her new ideas.

Stories.Name: Amidst the Stars
Stories.Descrtption: Keeping its promise, KU-Cass reveals a piece of crucial intel: an omnipotent Resonator once existed in the Black Shores. The clues leading to their legacy are now scattered throughout the Black Shores...

Stories.Name: Amidst the Stars
Stories.Descrtption: KU-Cass has provided you with numerous clues about that mysterious Resonator—some clues can be found on the surface, while others are scattered across Tethys' Deep...

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation III
Stories.Descrtption: On Day 3 of the Campaign, Lollo Navigator suffered an unexpected system crash. Maji needs your help to resolve the issue.

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation IV
Stories.Descrtption: The Day 4 Campaign content has been updated. The map now indicates a potential threat along the route. Investigate the area and assess the danger.

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation VI
Stories.Descrtption: Lollo Navigator is currently undergoing maintenance and needs reference information. Some of the items you've collected might help Maji resolve the issue…

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation VII
Stories.Descrtption: As the Campaign nears its conclusion, an emergency arises. Your immediate assistance is needed to address the situation…

Stories.Name: Ragunna Holiday
Stories.Descrtption: Outside Ragunna City, you run into Phoebe, who's on vacation. After the Carnevale, she decides to go on a pilgrimage to restore her peace of mind. Eager to show you Ragunna's wonders, she invites you to travel with her. Will this journey lead you to the answers you seek?

Stories.Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation I
Stories.Descrtption: The Day 1 Campaign content has been updated. Maji is ready for you to join forces and take on the new tasks.

Stories.Name: Cerulean Echoes Adrift in the Winds: Epilogue
Stories.Descrtption: Learn about the Aetherfin from Shorekeeper.

Stories.Name: Ragunna Sales Blitz IV
Stories.Descrtption: Alannah seems to be interested in Lollo Logistics vehicles

Stories.Name: Ragunna Sales Blitz V
Stories.Descrtption: Hmm? Alannah isn't in town today?

Stories.Name: Woman in Mask
Stories.Descrtption: A well-dressed mysterious person in a mask has appeared on Riccioli Island, but their odd demeanor doesn't match their refined attire.

Stories.Name: The Sailor's Treasure
Stories.Descrtption: Not all treasure of the sea is left behind by pirates, some could have been left by ordinary sailors... or a captain.

Stories.Name: Message in a Bottle
Stories.Descrtption: If you come across a message in a bottle, don't hesitate to check it out. Who knows, it might be one with precious dreams and hopes inside...

Stories.Name: Go Get Some Fish
Stories.Descrtption: It's fish-hunting time!

Stories.Name: Every Flavor Bell-less Crab Challenge
Stories.Descrtption: When you take the bell off the Bell Crab, do you steam it, roast it, or... turn it into something special?

Stories.Name: Hooked on Trouble
Stories.Descrtption: You may catch more than just fish when out at sea...

Stories.Name: The Bizarre Brothers
Stories.Descrtption: You helped the three brothers with their respective troubles, and they want to thank you in person.

Stories.Name: Restore Plushie Village I
Stories.Descrtption: Through your hard work, meaningful changes have taken root in Plushie Village. In the meantime, the village receives a new visitor—a Tubpup.

Stories.Name: Restore Plushie Village II
Stories.Descrtption: Through your hard work, meaningful changes have taken root in Plushie Village. In the meantime, the village receives a new visitor...

Stories.Name: Restore Plushie Village III
Stories.Descrtption: You retrieved a photo from the sphere inside the morph painting, which reveals clues to a hidden past...

Stories.Name: Restore Plushie Village IV
Stories.Descrtption: Finally, the restoration of the Plushie Village is complete! There will be a small celebration party and you're invited!

Stories.Name: Shadows of the Past
Stories.Descrtption:
The Fisalia family's heir seems to have a request.
In Thessaleo Fells, a mysterious Terminal is flickering with ominous light. What secrets of the past might it hold?

Stories.Name: The Best Audience
Stories.Descrtption: Lorenzo from Egla Town seems in need of help.

Stories.Name: Treasures in the Painting
Stories.Descrtption: Some part of the painted tower is glowing.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Averardo Vault
Stories.Descrtption: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Averardo Vault to her.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Whisperwind Haven
Stories.Descrtption: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Whisperwind Haven to her.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Penitent's End
Stories.Descrtption: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Penitent's End to her.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Thessaleo Fells
Stories.Descrtption: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Thessaleo Fells to her.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Hallowed Reach
Stories.Descrtption: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in the Hallowed Reach to her.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Fagaceae Peninsula
Stories.Descrtption: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in the Fagaceae Peninsula to her.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Ragunna City
Stories.Descrtption: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Ragunna City to her.

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Nimbus Sanctum
Stories.Descrtption: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Nimbus Sanctum to her.

Stories.Name: The Adventures of Plushie Squad
Stories.Descrtption: You receive a call from Fulmine, who was asked by a few mysterious "people" to send you an invitation...

Stories.Name: The Adventures of Plushie Squad
Stories.Descrtption: You and the plushies journey above the clouds, where a world of wonder awaits your discovery.

Stories.Name: Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways
Stories.Descrtption: A familiar voice echoes through the dreamscape's frequencies, introducing himself as "Ebony Gatekeeper." You decide to seek him out and uncover what he's up to.

Stories.Name: The Adventures of Plushie Squad
Stories.Descrtption: As your adventure comes to an end, you learn that the Plushie Village still has another surprise waiting for you.

Stories.Name: Three Wishes
Stories.Descrtption: The turmoil in Septimont has been resolved. Enjoy the moment of peaceful respite with your fellow traveler.

Stories.Name: Companionship
Stories.Descrtption: The turmoil in Septimont has been resolved. Enjoy the beautiful sunset with your companion.

Stories.Name: Serendipity
Stories.Descrtption: The turmoil in Septimont has been resolved. The young lady who offered you help is now on vacation.

Stories.Name: Avinoleum Footsteps
Stories.Descrtption: An elderly hermit is writing his memoirs by the seminary ruins. He would like some images of Avinoleum.

Stories.Name: Memory Travelogue
Stories.Descrtption: KU-Lolo has a new idea to turn your fondest memories into unique Cube souvenirs in the Second Coming of Solaris! <color=HighlightB>Head on over to the Memory Travelogue event</color>, collect memories with with the Cubes, and turn them in to KU-Lolo!

Stories.Name: Beyond the Waves
Stories.Descrtption: The Pioneer Association and Lollo Logistics introduced another joint campaign. Go check it out over at the Lollo Logistics Truck.

Stories.Name: Uncovering Past Heroes
Stories.Descrtption:
The clouds above bear witness to echoing battle cries, the wild lands remember the footsteps of warriors, and rushing currents carry the fiery passion of the brave. Here, every corner holds shining tributes to a glorious history. The towering cities, spires, and mighty walls forged by the people of the Septimont stand as enduring proof of their strength and resolve.

At the harbor, you meet a quarreling father and daughter. This unexpected encounter sets you on a journey to uncover the rich history of Septimont...

Stories.Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Avinoleum
Stories.Descrtption: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Avinoleum to her.

Stories.Name: Plushie Squad's Clean Return
Stories.Descrtption: After a long journey, the plushie squad is a mess… Let's help them freshen up and get sparkling clean again.

Stories.Name: Duel of Destiny
Stories.Descrtption: Two legendary Gladiators are about to face their destined duel atop the tower. Sulpicia asks you to learn the story behind it…

Stories.Name: Dream Contagion
Stories.Descrtption: Complete the challenge and defeat the Nightmare hidden within the Dreamscape Node.

Stories.Name: Samousas's Treasure
Stories.Descrtption: Samousas stash was washed downstream. To fulfill his childhood dream, he asks you to retrieve the lost box.

Stories.Name: Fantastic Ta-das and Where to Find Them
Stories.Descrtption: By the cliff's edge, a peculiar girl draws your attention. She seems to be attempting some sort of challenge.

Stories.Name: Walk the Path of the Dragon
Stories.Descrtption: Jocaresa asked for your help collecting Remnant Energy crystals from the dragon bones. She claims this could grant you the power of an ancient dragon.

Stories.Name: Deep Sea Survey
Stories.Descrtption: The Fabricatorium of the Deep has stirred beneath the waves, its unrest quietly noted by the nobles and the Order. To prevent further disruption to the lives of the people of Ragunna and to avoid unnecessary panic, both sides held a rare private meeting. In an unprecedented move, they reached a consensus: a full re-survey of the facility must be conducted to inform joint discussions on the fate of the Fabricatorium and the Common Echoes it holds. As the only one to return from that place unscathed, you are undoubtedly the best person to lead this expedition.

Stories.Name: May Applause Greet You
Stories.Descrtption: It seems like the nearby hunting camp was attacked. Go check it out.

Stories.Name: The Present and the Future
Stories.Descrtption: You return to Ragunna to see whether the aftermath of the Fabricatorium of the Deep reached the people there, but unexpectedly run into Zani in the city. Might as well talk to her to catch up with the situation.

Stories.Name: Dream of A Rusted Sword: Part I
Stories.Descrtption: In a valley scarred by the Dark Tide, an old Gladiator silently awaits his destiny. Like an ancient, rusted sword, he dreams of past glories.

Stories.Name: Prints of Plateaus
Stories.Descrtption: You meet an old lady in the Asphodel Barrens. She gazes at the fleeting frequencies off into the distance in search of a lost companion who can never return...

Stories.Name: Dream of A Rusted Sword: Part II
Stories.Descrtption: In a valley scarred by the Dark Tide, an old Gladiator silently awaits his destiny. Like an ancient, rusted sword, he dreams of past glories.

Stories.Name: Dream of A Rusted Sword: Finale
Stories.Descrtption: One departs in the dream. Many return from the dream.

Stories.Name: Morning Star I
Stories.Descrtption: The crisis is over, but Rinascita still has a long road ahead of it…

Stories.Name: Morning Star II
Stories.Descrtption: The displaced long to rebuild the Old District into their new home, but evil clings like a shadow.

Stories.Name: Morning Star III
Stories.Descrtption: The kindness once sown now bears fruit.

Stories.Name: Morning Star IV
Stories.Descrtption: Now the storm has passed, let us celebrate again.

Stories.Name: Morning Star: Those Who Remain in the Night Part I
Stories.Descrtption: There seems to be a commotion going on in the Old District, with a noblewoman surrounded by a crowd. She looks all too familiar…

Stories.Name: Morning Star: Those Who Remain in the Night Part II
Stories.Descrtption: Luther makes a surprise visit to the Old District and seems to be after someone. You soon realize who that someone is…

Stories.Name: Help Cherry hand out the tonic
Stories.Descrtption: Help Cherry hand out the tonic to those in need

Stories.Name: Mummer's Wish
Stories.Descrtption: You rescued a weak Aria Mummer near Septimont City. It entrusts you with four Melody Boxes, each carrying a piece of music. What story might they tell?

Stories.Name: Dreams of Cindertide
